item.title: Git client configurations for multiple identities
item.description: The bane of maintenance If you’re like me, you’re using your computer not just for work but also for your own personal projects and learning efforts. After all, why would you buy a completely separate machine just for the sake of maintaining two separate working environments, keeping them up-to-date and running while also constantly forgetting about where exactly you put that one file .. was it your personal laptop? Or was it on your machine dedicated for work .
